content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: honeycomb_block
inventory=[{"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 29, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft honeycomb_block. Honeycomb_block requires placing 4 honeycombs in a 2x2 square in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move one of the honeycombs from slot 44 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honeycomb_block
inventory=[{"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 29, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]

thought: Since the first honeycomb has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another honeycomb to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the honeycomb to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honeycomb_block
inventory=[{"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 29, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]

thought: The second honeycomb has been placed to the right of the first honeycomb. Now I need to place another honeycomb below the first one. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the honeycomb to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honeycomb_block
inventory=[{"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 29, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: The third honeycomb has been placed below the first honeycomb. Now I need to place the last honeycomb to the right of the third honeycomb. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the honeycomb to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honeycomb_block
inventory=[{"type": "honeycomb_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 29, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: Now I can craft the honeycomb_block by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
